com.lhl.java7.utils

Class OnEntryAndExitStateMachine<S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lhl.java7.utils.StateMachine<S>
      • com.lhl.java7.utils.ObservableStateMachine<S>
        • com.lhl.java7.utils.OnEntryAndExitStateMachine<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - The type that defines the state of the machine.

    public class OnEntryAndExitStateMachine<S>
extends ObservableStateMachine<S>
    A StateMachine that runs a Runnable when it enters and leaves its corresponding state.
    Author:
    LÃŠ-HEBRARD Laurent

        initialState - the initial state of the state machine.

    • Method Detail

      • setState

        public void setState(S state)
        Description copied from class: StateMachine
        Change the state of this StateMachine to the state provided as argument.

        This method is meant to trigger behaviors defined by subclasses of StateMachine.

        Specified by:
        setState in class StateMachine<S>
        Parameters:
        state - The new state that the machine will take.

      • addBehavior

        protected void addBehavior(S state,
                           Map<S,Collection<Runnable>> behaviorType,
                           Runnable behavior)
        Adds a behavior for the given state on the given Map.
        Parameters:
        state - the state for which the given behavior will be run.
        behaviorType - the Map in which to store the given behavior.
        behavior - the functor that will be run when this state machine changes of state to the given state.

      • addEntryBehavior

        public void addEntryBehavior(S state,
                             Runnable behavior)
        Adds a functor that will be run when this state machine enters the state provided as argument.
        Parameters:
        state - the state for which the given behavior will be run.
        behavior - the functor that will be run when this state machine enters the given state.

      • addExitBehavior

        public void addExitBehavior(S state,
                            Runnable behavior)
        Adds a functor that will be run when this state machine leaves the state provided as argument.
        Parameters:
        state - the state for which the given behavior will be run.
        behavior - the functor that will be run when this state machine leaves the given state.
